author: Howard Bamber
comment: They don't ever show up on my watch. I'm not stupid. I've had a 360 from day one and this has not happened. Back to watchmaker. Better faces and free. Oh they turn up instantly!No wonder it's called "rich"  They take money for nothing.
title: Paid for faces

author: Rich Luck
comment: This watch face kills my phone battery on the S7 edge. Installed and ran all the tine even when not in use on my watch. Force stopped and back to normal. Uninstalled as it's not that great anyway and is ridiculously to run all the time. Kills the doze feature Samsung has as it runs while the phone is sleeping.
title: Burns phone battery

author: Jimmy Crasto
comment: World clock with color in ambient mode Xcellent set of ideas. Wow superb hands up. Make more interesting designs lyk dis. Den tht will b five star but need to include secs hand in ambient mode wuld b more real den
title: Gr8 idea

author: James Earley
comment: It crashes when I go to settings

author: Joe Feise
comment: With the recent changes to set the timezone names and font, this watchface is near perfect for me..
title: Great watch face

author: bhavin mistry
comment: Its look square in moto 360 look bad .... You need to re test and the deploy it again
title: Not as good as you explain

author: Martin
comment: I need a multi timezone watch,  this is a good start,  but can you guys not make a great design multi timezone watch.
title: Need a better design

author: shrihara Palanetra
comment: Worth buying all of them for your Moto 360. Only this from Rich watchface looks good on Moto 360
title: All themes are spectacular

author: Hitesh Sharma
comment: please fix moto 360
title: not showing up on my watch or android wear

author: wayne foster
comment: Doesn't get to my watch tried a few times im unintstalling it

author: Greg Bullock
comment: Poor antialiasing in standby mode airtight reasonable sweety of options. Needs done more work.
title: Average

author: Tom Ritucci
comment: Love the mini digital clock!

author: Tran Tori
comment: Good. Free 2 theme.
title: Lg g3

author: montasser el kimary
comment: Very stylish and helpful.

author: Tomas D.
comment: Moto 360 works great. Date and year awesome
title: A+, the best all around

author: young jsyn
comment: Wish the day off the week showed but it's still a great app!
title: Wish the day off the week showed

author: Leo Garcia
comment: You should combine your themes together into 1 app (concrete and leather). It would be perfect if you use the leather watch hands with the concrete watch face. Also removing the world clock option is needed too.
title: Bought the black

author: Krzysztof Skiba
comment: But it would be great if timezone clocks could be disabled in settings.
title: Nice watch face

author: Dave Poore
comment: Good design. On my moto 360, the inner dials contrast is lacking a bit, at least worth the included faces. It would also be nice to specify that I have a round face wear device and have it only sync the round choice. I have a 'Rect' option that I don't want.
title: Nice looking faces

author: 吴尼莫
comment: just one question: how do I let the card doesn't show on first screen? The card looks too big but I don't want mute mode or swipe it away…LG G watch
title: Good looking

author: Blake Daniels-Britton
comment: I cannot switch between 24hr & 12hr time display. Otherwise, it's OK.
title: Time display a problem

author: Joe Tamburello
comment: I bought the black version for my moto 360, and when it goes from dim to regular, or regular to dim, the dimensions change (it shrinks/enlarges a bit) and the transition looks bad. Please fix!  Then it's 5 stars.

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: I have just updated new version of the watch and it fixed the shrink problem. Thank you for your patient.

title: Awesome look, but...

author: Vladimir Kornev
comment: Please fix moto 360 resize problem on dimmed display.
title: Awesome design but annoying bug

author: Rodrigo Costa
comment: Always when I have a notification the skins became like for Samsung Gear "square" mode. I don't have premium, but always the screen display quickly the black skin before display the white one.
title: Not working properly on moto 360

author: Collin Chapin
comment: I wish the low energy mode was set for round face with 360 and also I wish I could get rid of the "concrete" text...
title: Amazing app BUT

author: Matthew Ybarra
comment: Even after the update, the watch faces are still rectangular.

reply.author: collamo
reply.content:
Please check latest version of the watch. 
It provides round watch selection on your watch, and a layout should be fixed.

title: Moto 360 issue *Fixed in latest update*

author: Kirill Karpelson
comment: The font and hands on the two smaller dials are tiny and unreadable.
title: Too small

author: Billy Peene
comment: Nice design, just not much customizing available other than colors (pay for) and time zones
title: Nice

comment: Works great. Looks more great.
title: Round face support

author: Brad Corwin
comment: The watchface looks great!  The most recent update fixed the round watchface and it offers a great alternative for the Moto 360.

reply.author: collamo
reply.content:
Please check latest version of the watch. 
It provides round watch selection on your watch, and a layout should be fixed.

title: Nice Moto 360 Watch Face

author: Adam B
comment: Looks alright but make the words at the bottom of the fact removable or customisable. It would also be better without the white battery icon in the left corner.
title: Good start.

author: Cesar Balcazar
comment: Square face on moto 360

reply.author: collamo
reply.content:
Please check latest version of the watch. 
It provides round watch selection on your watch, and a layout should be fixed.

author: Noam Amiran
comment: Battery percentage on the bottom, controlled by setting will be handy.
title: Cool

author: Scott Cole
comment: Classy look, great refinement in dimmed mode, displays all of the info I need, under a dollar for premium faces... What's not to like?
title: My Favorite Yet

author: Cubamus Prime
comment: And my LG watch reboot
title: Thanks for making the app

comment: Shows square watchface on moto 360

reply.author: collamo
reply.content:
Please check latest version of the watch. 
It provides round watch selection on your watch, and a layout should be fixed.

title: Only square

author: Kelly Barr
comment: Thanks. These are the best. Nice.
title: Love it

author: Ted Chen
comment: I'm so happy that the first watch face I could find that supported multiple timezones is so good looking. Nicely done!  One feature request... would it be possible to add the ability to specify the timezone name? I live in "Beijing" but the best I could use was "Shanghai".
title: Nice work!

author: Jade Taylor
comment: I would of bought all of them if they were 2.99 for all of them or even some customization for hand colors,  textures, and background colors.
title: Sweet faces,  totally worth the install

author: Mihai Niculae
comment: The developer should at least have the common decency to change the pictures in the play store to reflect the fact that the black watch face (the one I downloaded the app for) is in fact premium. Uninstalled it immediately.
